name: Mars Action Rover Searcher
description:
There are 5 endings. If you have a heart condition, then maybe don't collect all 10 rocks. For more detailed instructions, see Operating Manual in screenshots.

Controls:

WASD + mouse: Directional

Space: Shoot Laser (use on rocks to collect them)

E: Interact with MHC Controls

F: Toggle Overlay

G: Mute all current sounds

1-5: Display Mission

Escape: Display Exit/Restart Menu

This was made in Coppercube for the Horror Jam - Space: https://itch.io/jam/100-prize-horror-jam-3

Textures/imagery/concept art created using www.craiyon.com and then I edited them.

Sounds Edited:

Wind sound on Mars: https://mars.nasa.gov/mars2020/participate/sounds/?playlist=mars&item=wind-on-mars-01&type=mars

"Mysterious sound" on Mars/Fluid pump: https://mars.nasa.gov/mars2020/participate/sounds/?playlist=mars&item=fluid-pump...

Coppercube "Do later" Extension: 

https://www.ambiera.com/coppercube/download_extensions.html

This game was worked on from August 27, 2022 - September 2, 2022
